contribution_desc:
Recommender tool for automatically creating multi-device responsive UIs.
Relevant for cross-platform UIs.
evaluation: Technical performance (speed); User study (qualitative); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
devices_included: Any screen device; Tablet; Phone; Laptop; Desktop computer
crossdevice_def: Use terms multi-device UIs, but mostly about cross-platform and across differently sized device.
